summary: The Spice Girls were a super popular British girl group in the 1990s. They were made up of five members, each with a unique nickname like "Scary Spice" and "Posh Spice." The group sold over 100 million records, making them the best-selling girl group ever. They were known for their catchy songs, fun fashion, and "girl power" message. They had huge hits like "Wannabe" and "Spice Up Your Life," and even starred in their own movie, *Spice World*. The Spice Girls won many awards and were a big part of pop culture, inspiring a love of girl groups and celebrity news.
title: Spice Girls
